metadata.title: CVE-2017-17788 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a stack-based buffer over-read in xcf_load_streamin app/xcf/xcf.c when there is no '\0' character after the version string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2
gimp-data - 2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2
libgimp2.0 - 2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.10-0ubuntu1.2').
